Research Ethics
A committee is formed in the University for Ethical Research
Researchers follow norms laid down by Research Ethics Committee for the use of animals,
human subjects, recombinant DNA, biological agents and radioactive materials
Bioethics includes medical ethics, which focuses on issues in health care and relationship between
human activities and the environment
Chemical ethics promote safety, good laboratory practices and precautions in procurement, storage,
handling and disposal of hazardous substances
Adhering to Plagiarism check is ensured by the concerned supervisor before submitting the
